articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets French Guests
Kim Il Chol Meets Delegation of VPA
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets French Guests 
   Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a cordial talk with Bruno Lafont, chairman and chief executive officer of the Lafarge Company of France, and his companion, Nassef Sawiris, chief executive officer of the Orascom Construction Industries of Egypt, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Wednesday.
